text:

title: > PLAY
text:
> HELLO WORLD !




Hi, my name is 
Matthieu Hanf.


> I'm passionnate about 
Health Data Science.


> I like to design tools from data that 
make insights for health professionals & patients.


> I live in Paris with 
my family.


For more :

> 
Resume
> 
Research
> 
Project












> PICTURE















> CONTACT




> 
I will be glad to hear from you.

> You can find me elsewhere.

title: Projects
text:
Personal projects










ShinyRating
ShinyRating is an R package that allow to create rating inputs in Shiny. Optimized for Bootstrap 5 


Github







ShinyFriendlyCaptcha
ShinyFriendlyCaptcha is a R package that provide a GDPR compliant Captcha  to Shiny apps ((Friendly Captcha). Friendly Captcha is an European alternative to Google Recaptcha. It allow to protect websites against spam and bots in a privacy-embedded design.


Github







ShinyLemonPie
Work In Progress


Github

title: Projects
text:
Packages
During my free & professional time, I like to play with R, HTML, CSS, and Javascript to construct R shiny packages that facilitate the design of apps ready for production (and maximize time for Data Science & Research).










ShinyRating
ShinyRating is an R package that allow to create rating inputs in Shiny. Several options
    are available (type, number, color, size, margin, tooltip, mode and animation of icons).





Open













ShinyFriendlyCaptcha
Friendly Captcha is a GDPR compliant European alternative to Google Recaptcha.
    ShinyFriendlyCaptcha is a R package that provide Friendly Captcha to Shiny apps.





Open













Interfacer
Interfacer is an R package developped for Sesan that allows to simplify the development,
    layout, theme design and deployment of complex
    web forms using Shiny.





Private













Authentifier
Authentifier is an R package developped for Sesan that add a simple, 
    strong or openID authentication layer as well as a 
    user account management toolbar to Shiny apps.





Private
